cars.description: This is an immaculate 1998 Mercury Cougar with only 25000 miles on it! The breaks might go out on you.. in the rain on a hill.. and the wheel bearing might break on you in a tunnel but at least it is turquoise.
This is great 1998 machines name is Yoda. It has 150000 miles on it. The tires may or may not blow up on you...
This quad-door, 2500, black, lifted, can be yours for only 3000! It is not very good in rain... it may or may not hydroplane into a tree.
This beautiful lifted tinted black 4 door Jeep is perfect for you 1st date mudding needs.
This Jetta is brand spakin new- built in june 2016! Beautifully made German car with only one accident!
